```{css}
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body {
  background-color: white;
  font-family: Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

h2 {
  font-size:16px;
  margin-right: 12px;

}

.right h2 {

margin-right: 0px;
margin-left: 12px;

}

/* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */
.timeline {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  margin-top: 120px;
}

.col-md-9 {
  width: 100%;
}

/* The actual timeline (the vertical ruler) */
.timeline::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 2px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 75%;

}

/* Container around content */
.container_tm {
  position: relative;
  background-color: inherit;
 /* display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: auto auto; */
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;

}

/* The actual content */
.content {
  /* grid-column: 1 / span 1; */
  position: relative;

}

 .connector {
 	/* grid-column: 2 / span 1; */
	/* width: 100%; */
    border-bottom: 1px solid grey;
    height: 24px;
    min-width: 100px;
    flex-grow: 1;

}

.container_tm.left {

	width: 75%;

}

/* The circles on the timeline */
.container_tm.left::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  right: -6px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}


/* The circles on the timeline */
.container_tm.right::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
  left: -4px;
  background-color: grey;
  top: 18px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  z-index: 1;
}

.container_tm.right {
  width: 25%;
}

.container_tm.right .connector {

width: 100px;
flex-grow: 0;

}


/* Place the container to the left */
.left {
  left: 0;
}

/* Place the container to the right */
.right {
  left: 75%;
}




/* Media queries - Responsive timeline on screens less than 600px wide */
@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  /* Place the timelime to the left */
  .timeline::after {
  left: 31px;
  }

  /* Full-width containers */
  .container {
  width: 100%;
  padding-left: 70px;
  padding-right: 25px;

  }



  /* Make sure that all arrows are pointing leftwards */
  .container::before {
  left: 60px;
  border: medium solid white;
  border-width: 10px 10px 10px 0;
  border-color: transparent white transparent transparent;
  }

  /* Make sure all circles are at the same spot */
  .left::after, .right::after {
  left: 15px;
  }

  /* Make all right containers behave like the left ones */
  .right {
  left: 0%;
  }
}
```


```{r}
library(jsonlite)

df <- fromJSON("../data.json")
```

```{r, results='asis'}
cat('<div class="timeline">')

for (i in seq_len(nrow(df))) {
  if (df[i, "class"] == "preprint") {
    cat('<div class="container_tm left">')
    cat('<div class="content">')
    cat('<h2>', df[i, "title"], '</h2>')
    cat('<p>', df[i, "authorString"], '</p>')
    cat('</div>')
    cat('<div class="connector"></div>')
    cat('</div>')
  } else if (df[i, "class"] == "event") {
    cat('<div class="container_tm right">')
    cat('<div class="connector"></div>')
    cat('<div class="content">')
    cat('<h2>', df[i, "title"], '</h2>')
    cat('</div>')
    cat('</div>')
  }

}

cat('</div>')
```
